scripts.test:size: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const dist='dist';const sizes={};function getSize(dir){const files=fs.readdirSync(dir);files.forEach(f=>{const p=path.join(dir,f);const s=fs.statSync(p);if(s.isDirectory()){getSize(p);}else{sizes[path.relative(dist,p)]=s.size;}});}getSize(dist);const total=Object.values(sizes).reduce((a,b)=>a+b,0);console.log('\nBundle Size Analysis:');console.log('═══════════════════════');Object.entries(sizes).sort((a,b)=>b[1]-a[1]).forEach(([f,s])=>console.log(`${f}: ${(s/1024).toFixed(2)} KB`));console.log('───────────────────────');console.log(`Total: ${(total/1024).toFixed(2)} KB`);console.log(`Target: < 500 KB for core functionality`);console.log(total<512000?'✓ Within target':'⚠ Exceeds target');"
